inclusion.criterion: Age greater than or equal to 6 and less than 13 years
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Pre-pubertal or having at most early puberty (breast Tanner I, II or III for girls, testes size less than or equal to 8 mL for boys)
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Hyperinsulinemia, defined as fasting insulin concentration greater than or equal to 15 mIU/mL
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Obesity, defined as body mass index greater than or equal to 95th percentile determined by NHANES I age and sex specific data
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Subjects must have fasting plasma glucose less than 126 mg/dl
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Subjects must have glycosylated hemoglobin (HgbA1C) of less than or equal to 6.5%
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Females who begin menstruating (or who are at risk for pregnancy) during the study must have a negative pregnancy test and must use an effective method of contraception if they are engaging in sexual intercourse
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Baseline creatinine greater or equal to 1.0 mg/dl
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Significant cardiac or pulmonary disease likely to or resulting in hypoxia or decreased perfusion
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Hepatic disease with elevated liver function tests (ALT or AST) greater than or equal to 1.5 the upper limits of normal
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: An alcohol history concerning for development of hepatic toxicity
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Evidence for Type 2 diabetes, including fasting plasma glucose greater than or equal to 126 mg/dl or HgbA1C greater than 6.5%
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Weight loss of greater than 2% of bodyweight within the past 6 months
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Presence of other endocrinologic disorders leading to obesity (e.g. Cushing's Syndrome)
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: The patient has a history of smoking and drinking, but no underlying disease such as DM. He is in relation with several partners and uses condom during intercourse.
